title: startRecording
description: Start recording the current browser viewport. Must be followed by a `stopeRecording` action. Supported extensions: [ '.mp4', '.webm', '.gif' ]

overwrite.description: If `true`, overwrites files at the specified path. If `false`, skips the action if a file exists at the specified path.

mediaDirectory.description: The directory path for media created by the action. Overrides the default directory config. Default is config.imageDirectory or config.videoDirectory depending on the file type.

filename.description: Name of the media file. If not specified, the filename is randomized.

width.description: Target width of the recording. Defaults to the browser window width.

height.description: Target height of the recording. Defaults to the browser window height.
